Interface Norm<O>

  • Type Parameters:
    O - Object type
    All Superinterfaces:
    DistanceFunction<O>, PrimitiveDistanceFunction<O>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EuclideanDistanceFunction, HSBHistogramQuadraticDistanceFunction, LPIntegerNormDistanceFunction, LPNormDistanceFunction, MahalanobisDistanceFunction, ManhattanDistanceFunction, MatrixWeightedQuadraticDistanceFunction, MaximumDistanceFunction, MinimumDistanceFunction, OnedimensionalDistanceFunction, RGBHistogramQuadraticDistanceFunction, SparseEuclideanDistanceFunction, SparseLPNormDistanceFunction, SparseManhattanDistanceFunction, SparseMaximumDistanceFunction, SparseSquaredEuclideanDistanceFunction, SquaredEuclideanDistanceFunction, SubspaceEuclideanDistanceFunction, SubspaceLPNormDistanceFunction, SubspaceManhattanDistanceFunction, SubspaceMaximumDistanceFunction, WeightedEuclideanDistanceFunction, WeightedLPNormDistanceFunction, WeightedManhattanDistanceFunction, WeightedMaximumDistanceFunction, WeightedSquaredEuclideanDistanceFunction

    public interface Norm<O>
extends PrimitiveDistanceFunction<O>
    Abstract interface for a mathematical norm.
    Since:
    0.5.0
    Author:
    Erich Schubert
